favourite.article: Wonderful hymn! Lord grant us such sweet fellowship with You all the days!

it is a beautiful example of Victorian Christian mysticism.
Here are the other verses:
Alone with thee, amid the mystic shadows, The solemn hush of nature newly borne; Alone with Thee in breathless adoration, In the calm dew and freshness of the morn.
Still, still with Thee! as to each newborn morning A fresh and solemn splendour still is given; So does this blessed consciouness awaking Breathe each day nearness unto Thee and heaven.
(Written by Harriet Beecher Stowe)
I LOVE this song! But, there are more verses to this song.
